text: Callidrepana jianfenglingensis is a moth in the family Drepanidae first described by Y. Li, Y. Hu and M. Wang in 2014. It is found in Hainan, China.Li, Y., Hu, Y. & Wang, M. (2014) "A new species of Callidrepana Felder, 1861 (Lepidoptera: Drepanidae) from Hainan, China". Tinea. 22 (5): 316-317. ==References== Category:Moths described in 2014 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of China
title: Callidrepana jianfenglingensis
